website_summaries.verdict: Without a doubt the best Dutch oven on the market. The most versatile and highest-quality appliance available.
pros: Offers a blend of traditional craftsmanship and cutting-edge technology that makes it a staple of many professional kitchens
Owners say they would never consider another model

customer_reviews.title: Waste of moneyl
customer_reviews.text: I read how superior this product was and how easy clean up is...I used it once to braise meat and It didnt clean well even when soaked in soap and water...I've used other cheaper brands $40.00 and less..with same results..I would like my money back...I wonder who wrote these reviews...save your money..
customer_reviews.author: Mike m

customer_reviews.title: A helper for the cook in your life
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this Dutch oven cooks. This product keeps the heat in so well I can cook at a lower temp. The Dutch oven saves time, money. The food you prepare will be delicious the meat will be tender. The flavors in your food will be enhanced. I used to love using my slow cooker. When I got my Dutch oven I have not used the slow cooker. The Dutch oven will make you look like a pro. I am an experienced cook, this baby makes me look like a galloping Gourmet . Le Creuset is perfection. worth the money. Enjoy your cooking you will love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cederquist

customer_reviews.title: Never disappoints.
customer_reviews.text: I have cook several meals in my Le Creuset now and I so love it. There is no comparison between cooking with a regular dutch oven and a Le Creuset. Not only because it is so easy to clean but it heats the items evenly, and browns food perfectly. I have 2 pieces now and I plan on adding more. I do recommend this larger size as I have cooked whole chickens, other large meals AND small items also.
customer_reviews.author: The Tam'ster

customer_reviews.title: Such a good quality dutch oven
customer_reviews.text: Such a good quality dutch oven. I can make large batches of soup, sauce, and cook a whole chicken it--not at the same time. :-) I love the color, adds a nice bit of color to the kitchen. And as I have a very small kitchen it sits on the stove all the time, so the look matters. But more important is the ease of cooking with, then cleaning this pot.
customer_reviews.author: dmbPhotog

customer_reviews.title: The Bentley of cookware
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this Dutch oven. What can you say about Le Creuset? It is the best of the best. Expensive? Yes. Worth the money? YES! I returned the too small 5 qt. for this 7 1/4 qt. I have make Chili, chicken and dumplings and bread pudding. It cleans like a charm. It’s the type of heirloom that you hope to pass down to your children/grandchildren. If you love to cook, save your money, wait for a decent sale, and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Girl

customer_reviews.title: Quality, performance, great results
customer_reviews.text: I have used this one a couple of times now, and it is everything I hoped it would be when I shelled out big bucks to buy it. It's amazing in its ability to heat up and to hold onto the heat, yet it has a glaze that retards sticking of the browned bits. I wish all my cookware were of such a high quality.
customer_reviews.author: D & J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper product was placed in a le creuset box
customer_reviews.text: Lodge product was in placed in a le creuset box, and le creuset sticker was placed on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to any kitchen. Food seems to taste better in it. My only reason for the 4/5 is that my first one came with damages to the enamel. Amazon corrected, but the second one had some minor imperfections as well that aren't on the cooking surface so I'm ok with. Not sure if shipping is that rough to the product, or what. We've had it for a few months and used several times and hasn't chipped yet....
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Quality control lacking
customer_reviews.text: Enamel on the lid defective. The “Caribbean” color enamel had black coloring and gaps. Particularly on the raised “Le Creuset” lettering. Both the original purchase and the replacement sent had the same problem. I purchase the: “Le Creuset LS2501-2817 Signature Enameled Cast-Iron Round French (Dutch) Oven, 7-1/4-Quart, Caribbean”
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Attention to details
customer_reviews.text: My item was not in perfect condition when I receive it furthermore I think it not as it’s hyped up to be lots of imperfections in the craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: Treybear

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product, 1 star manufacturer box
customer_reviews.text: Purchased arrived yesterday and while the pot was in good shape the box was a mess. No damage was shown on the actual Amazon box but the Le Creuset box had a huge gash and there was clear tape strapped all around to keep it closed. I’m mentioning this only because I intended to ship several for wedding showers but I’d be so embarrassed if they showed up in this condition. Great product but horrible presentation upon opening.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lilleness

customer_reviews.title: just love them. They are pricey
customer_reviews.text: Cant say enough about these... just love them. They are pricey, but in my opinion everything I have gotten from Le Creuset has been worth it. They are pieces that you hand down to your grand children. They are made well, cook well and look beautiful. And, as a bonus, you don't need to have tons of pans, pots and cookware if you're using these. Just a few essentials are all you need due to the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Hassig Gakev

customer_reviews.title: There are reasons this is a classic
customer_reviews.text: Well made, beautiful, and versatile! I've wanted one for years and finally did it. My first beef roast in it did get a little overdone - combo of cookbook over-estimating and the use of this new kitchen tool. One of my friends who also has one said that foods get done more quickly than you would expect in one of these. While reducing a sauce in it after roasting a chicken, I could see how well the heat is distributed by the heavy bottom by the pattern of boiling bubbles. No other pan I have distributes heat as well. The bubbles were all over the bottom of the pan, not just where the flames hit the bottom. Super quality!
customer_reviews.author: Robin L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money - Measureable improvement over other brands
customer_reviews.text: I've recently had other brands of dutch ovens and can attest to the benefits of this one. The Le Creuset is lighter than smaller capacity models from other brands. Even though bigger this one is appreciably lighter and easier to carry around and pull out of the oven. It also heats quickly. It has a flat surface to contact my electric stove burner rather than a curved base that reduces contact with the stove. It's cleaned up nicely and made some good food. It is about 6x the cost of the others so the others were useable but the Le Creuset provides some big benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Beward of cracks in outside enamel
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but it came with a crack in the outside by handle and company would not replace. Beware and check over when you get this product
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Chipped product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother as a gift and it cane damaged! The packers had to knowingly pack this in the box like this as the chipped paint was no where in the box. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot! It’s beautiful and so functional/versatile! A bit of difficulty to get sear stains off the cream colored bottom, but worth the extra effort.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I love it for making our soups
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy! I love it for making our soups. Non toxic :)
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a surprise to my son. He was ecstatic! Le Creuset is an awesome product. I have some older friends in their late 80's that have one of these. They said once you get one; it will be the only pot you will ever use. My 30-yr old son is a great cook and this will last him a life time.
customer_reviews.author: Ella H

customer_reviews.title: If you are only getting one French Oven/Stock Pot, this is the one to have.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's pricey but it will out last you, your children and your grandchildren. As home chefs, we love this oven. Outstanding durability, great cooking qualities and beautiful to boot. CI rated it the best French/Dutch Oven.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blaesing-Bauer

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: How am I 49 years young and haven’t had a quality Dutch oven like this? I don’t know but oh my goodness I’m in love! I use it on the stove top or throw it in the oven roasting a chicken. I will be buying more pieces. So easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E.

customer_reviews.title: The best Dutch oven, period
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it a couple times. I made a Sam the Cooking Guy Guinness Beef Short Ribs recipe add then a Beef Chuck Roast recipe...it’s amazing. Very pricey, but you will own it for the rest of your life.
customer_reviews.author: evh347

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it nearly every day since getting it. No wonder Le Creuset has such a great reputation! It gives the food such a great taste, cooks evenly, doesn't burn, easy to clean. I plan to buy the chicken cooker next. Pricey, but definitely worth it, such high quality. You'll never need to replace it. And-it's so pretty! (:
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Truly remarkable.  Excellent in every way.
customer_reviews.text: A truly wonderful product. We have a much smaller Le Creuset dutch oven that has been in use for a longtime with no issues other than a few dings and interior and exterior discoloration due to it's many years of heavy use. The primary reason I love this brand is it's simple design and ease of cleaning. Yes, it's expensive, but if you are looking for a quality product that will likely outlast you, you have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Great pot
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted a Le Creuset pot for a long time and it was totally worth the wait. Great product for both soups and for baking bread in. If baking bread be sure to buy the replacement knob for the lid which is metal. The knob that comes standard is not rated for the temps recommended for bread baking.
customer_reviews.author: gregory burnham

customer_reviews.title: Well - made, easy to clean and nothing sticks to the pot.
customer_reviews.text: One can never go wrong with Le Creuset items. Especially cooking an 8 hour Italian sauce. The heat is evenly distributed, allowing food to cook and not stick to the pot. Yes, the pot is a bit pricey, but worth every penny. I love the red color also.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Offutt

customer_reviews.title: Should be a part of every kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes its the simple things that make all the difference. I have never owned a pot of this quality. Finally, I can properly braise meats and get picture perfect results. Essential tool for fine cooking—and it also looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Jim

customer_reviews.title: After 5 years now, it looks as good as new and I am happy to have it
customer_reviews.text: I can imagine this being handed down to my daughter and her loving it as much as I do. I bought it with the Le Creuset silicone pad which I also have appreciated over the years. I also bought the cleaner with it and I tend to baby my 7-1/4 quart monster with TLC. There is some difficulty cleaning it due the weight and size in my sink. Be sure to dry it carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Mac

customer_reviews.title: Best overall cookware in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: A workhorse in my kitchen, the pan is great for sautéing, frying, slow-cooking, and braising. This is an heirloom quality pan.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dutch oven
customer_reviews.text: Using this for a few months now and it’s become my favorite kitchen tool. Haven’t used the crock pot since I got this and the food is way better. This thing is solid, easy to clean, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Best Dutch Oven
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy pot but it's very versatile and cooks everything beautifully. I'm extremely satisfied with the purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen T.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pot
customer_reviews.text: This pot is exactly what you would expect and want. It is thick and heavy, so it distributes heat evenly. It is super easy to clean as well. It's a must have in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Nindigully

customer_reviews.title: Great pot!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my wife as a Christmas gift and she loves it. It heats more evenly than any other pot and is very versatile. Will purchase more items from this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: If You Have Glass Top Stove
customer_reviews.text: I've "drooled" over Le Creuset for years - finally "invested" in the 7.5 quart. One of my better investments. I don't need to repeat other reviewer cooking comments; I'd just be re-iterating them. My only other functionality comment concerns use with a glass-topped stove. Do whatever it takes to keep this in place to minimize scratching. I used a very light grit emery cloth to "buff" the bottom. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Yooper Keith

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly
customer_reviews.text: No doubt this Dutch oven will last well beyond our life time into the next generation. Important to use all non metal when cooking and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Itsbettertolove

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pot
customer_reviews.text: I received this for Christmas and love it. I have used it for all types of dishes and it worked for all of them. It's easy to clean up (which I love) and is so beautiful I actually keep it on my stove top like a decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Met and exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Hoping to cook a big chili recipe that didn't burn on the bottom of the pan and ruin the taste of the dish, my new pan did incredible! Expensive investment but well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Towle

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Love Le Creuset and this pot is fantastic. Had the smaller size pot for a few years and wanted a bigger one to match.
customer_reviews.author: Tina K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I already knew this was a great dutch oven as far as function and durability. But what I am thrilled about is the color I ordered! I ordered the Oyster color and absolutely love it with my gray/neutral house. I know you don’t buy cooking pans for the color...but nevertheless, I am very happy with how it looks in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Dutch Oven Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Dutch Oven! Always wanted one. Great price for labeled "used" but not actually used. Probably a gift sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Goss

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a valentine gift for my girlfriend. It came in her favorite color. She doesn't want to put it away. I'm a hero.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a flawless condition and cooks like a dream! Great investment that will last generations.
customer_reviews.author: MFL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and beautiful.  Only pot I use now.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for most cooking needs. Would highly recommend if you want to make an investment.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: If you can get it on Sale all the better
customer_reviews.text: Love this cast iron. Not as heavy as some others I've owned. Color is nice. Great deal through Amazon warehouse. Perfect condition. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: LORI

customer_reviews.title: I love this cookingware
customer_reviews.text: One thing to keep in mind is, cook on a medium to low flame. Never on high flame.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: but know that it's the best as I have several different
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this pan yet, but know that it's the best as I have several different sizes
customer_reviews.author: charlene palmer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Just cooked a piece of lamb leg ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Just cooked a piece of lamb leg with potatoes and it turned out delicious. It seems I'll use it a lot as my kids loved the food too. Very happy, great product. Worth the money. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookware
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this cookware and so do I. My mother cooked with this when I was littlle so it has brought back some nice memories. You won't be disappointed! Well probably get more pieces over the next few years to complete a set..Caribbean is the color we went with..they look great
customer_reviews.author: J.G

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on anyother pot.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot. Worth every penny. Excellent quality. Cooks everything perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CDAGAL

customer_reviews.title: A Gift for our Son
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son. It is the same pot that we have used over the years. We have been extremely satisfied. However you must be careful since the bottom is not non-stick so it is not the easiest to clean if you burn something in the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie E.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Used it right away to make corned beef and cabbage. Product is excellent and works as described by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Pyewacket

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a wedding shower present for my husband's daughter. I have the same pot, given to me nearly 50 years ago! Indispensable & simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Best Pot I own
customer_reviews.text: This pot is amazing. From stovetop to oven you can do so much with it. It's HUGE, so you can cook for a large family. easy clean up...and warranteed by the manufacturer. I know it's expensive but you will have it forever. Plus...it is really attractive, i keep mine on top of the stovetop. Im going to slowly purchase the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: amazongroupie

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Le Creuset
customer_reviews.text: A no-brainer for quality. So refreshing in a world of cheap imitators. My sons have a new sibling;)
customer_reviews.author: Meags

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, simply perfect pot.
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful, very versatile useful pot is what I've been waiting for my whole entire life. It cooks up like a perfect dream and cleans as if it's brand new. Like another customer who purchased this Caribbean Le Creuset pot, I keep it at all times displayed on my stovetop in the kitchen displaying this most beautiful pot. I am so totally proud of my purchase! It is so well worth the money. I'm now in my 60's and feel I finally deserve something well worth the money spent. This pot works so perfectly well. My only regret is not having purchased it many, many years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: It’s La Creuset
customer_reviews.text: Spendy but you get what you pay for. My wife has wanted one for years and it was an awesome Christmas gift for her. She can be hard to please but this was one of her “best gifts ever”.
customer_reviews.author: OneLazyDog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Large handles are fantastic for holding the pot. Not near as heavy as I thought it would be. I wish I had another. I use it for nearly everything from roasting to frying to stewing to braising. Doesn't chip like other brands sold under celebrity names. Easy to clean. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: FishHead

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pot ever
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pot ever. I plan to cook with this for the next 50 years. It heats everything perfectly, and cleans up without a problem. Le Creuset really is the pinnacle of enameled Cast-Iron.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Broke the 3rd time we used it and no one will respond to our request for a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: marisa dejesus

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money and get the best.
customer_reviews.text: The best in the world for cooking. Had the cheap versions but they chip and end in the food.
customer_reviews.author: Harry M. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT FAMILY HERITAGE GIFT
customer_reviews.text: It made a great gift for our granddaughter. This Dutch Oven is easily recognizable as part of a family heritage. She will have it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Rosengard

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. It's awesome. She loves it, it works very well and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: krbfd2011

customer_reviews.title: "Lasts forever !! Well, almost !!"
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely PERFECT ! This is the 2nd one we've had ! The original one lasted over 40 years !!
customer_reviews.author: Pleased customer .

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color!!
customer_reviews.text: Was given this beautiful pot for my birthday and I love it! Caribbean is such a beautiful color and we love this brand! So happy to add it to the collection!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pot good for many tasks. Every serious cook needs one in their kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this pot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two different pots by this company and my wife thinks they are the best in the world. Remember "a happy wife is a happy life"
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: love love
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! Quality is there and very well made . Save up- it's totally worth it! I plan on getting the whole collection now and theming my kitchen after the set.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra O.

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Best pot I ever bought. I use it both ways, stove top and in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot!! I have a pie plate to match. Now to gather more of this set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ford

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset cast iron
customer_reviews.text: I choose this Le Creust French oven because it had good reveiws and the one I was looking at did not , i've used it several times and my husband and I both really like it , the way it cooks and cleans up, I would love to have other sizes. K. Blair
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Blair

customer_reviews.title: Soup pot
customer_reviews.text: Great pot for soups! Bigger than I expected. Guess didn't visualize just what a 7 qt pot would be like.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Hupperich

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but a real unit!
customer_reviews.text: This thing cost $300 - very expensive. But after several dishes, it has performed very well and is well worth the cost. It is a great Dutch Oven and will pay for itself over time. In the past, we've used an old cast-iron Dutch Oven but this new Le Creuset really out-performs the old one. If you often have a need for a Dutch Oven, the Le Creuset is well worth the cost. It cleans up very well, also.
customer_reviews.author: rocks

customer_reviews.title: great pot
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot: it weighs a ton, but like all Le Creusets it's just a great pot. Good addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Stetson

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Le Creuset French Oven for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. We have used it several times since then. It cooks evenly and cleans up quite well. A little heavy for me but perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: S.k

customer_reviews.title: worth spending extra
customer_reviews.text: Id rather buy this one pot in my lifetime than buy two pots of half the price over my lifetime or be dissatisfied with a cheaper design. Cleans quick and easy. Probably need to season the exposed iron rim to keep away rust. Excellent addition to my legacy le creuset items that i have inherited. Will stand to test of time and use im sure.
customer_reviews.author: parky259

customer_reviews.title: More for me of the best....
customer_reviews.text: I love anything Le Creuset and this is no exception!
customer_reviews.author: kate jakobsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Now that I have, kick myself for not ordering years earlier. Lifetime investment.
customer_reviews.author: amf

customer_reviews.title: Not made in China.I loooove it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for a long time but I was watching the price lol. My husband bought it for me for Mothers Day and I love it.We used to to make chili and then a curry and It cleans up so nicely. Thankfully it wasn't made in China. Yaaas lol! This will last a very long time and pass on to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Keshia L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that we have used several times. They're expensive but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Samm

customer_reviews.title: Definately worth it - fabulous pot
customer_reviews.text: I love my new yellow friend. I like cooking on cast iron but taking care of the cookware can be tedious at times. With this pot there is no more seasoning to worry about, just wash and go. I just made potato soup and it came out beautifully. I cooked down the bacon onions and mushroom and once I added the liquid the pot deglazed itself and clean up was a snap. I have a ceramic stove top and I had no problems at all. If you are on the fence about buying one like I was (took me three years to make up my mind) don't wait any longer it is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, durable, easy to clean, and the handle cools very rapidly after removing from the oven just in case you forget and grab it without a hot pad.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It is what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I needed that name and color, and got what I wanted. I'm satisfied. It's been in use several time per week since arrival. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron A. Gesicki

customer_reviews.title: Deep purchase
customer_reviews.text: With a name and price point of Le Creuset you expect nothing but the best. I am more than pleased with the build quality and product performance!
customer_reviews.author: John Hayden

customer_reviews.title: I'm no great chef but I can cook a thing or two ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Le Creuset item I've ever owned. I'm no great chef but I can cook a thing or two and I have to say this pot was expensive and worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: edward roth

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I debated about getting a less expensive option and I'm glad I sprung for the real thing. It looks and performs beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Salo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Le Creuset Cast-iron Signature for my wife and she loves it made real well.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun

customer_reviews.title: My First Le Creuset  Cast-Iron
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these Beautiful French Ovens for so long and finally bit the bullet!! So glad I did!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot! It was my first Le Creuset pot, but I use it for everything! It makes AMAZING bread. It's expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Romney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size and sooooo well made! Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect even cooking every time.
customer_reviews.text: This French oven works beautifully. We made a chicken stew in it when we got it and the chicken came out perfectly tender and very juicy.
customer_reviews.author: David Munday

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Lovely to heavy for disabled person but husband loves Lovely to heavy for disabled person but husband loves it is very heavy when filled with food and I a unable to use
customer_reviews.author: SPowell

customer_reviews.title: While not cheap - all of Le Creuset's cast iron ...
customer_reviews.text: While not cheap - all of Le Creuset's cast iron pots and pans are timeless and a staple for any kitchen. There's no question that these are true value for the money and will last a lifetime - well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend quite delighted
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend, who's been wanting one of these forever. A bit pricy, but you get what you pay for! She loves it to death, and makes the most amazing soups, roasts, and vegetables in it. Super amazing piece of cookware that will surely last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: BucketheadShred

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cooks and cleans up beautifully. Meets or exceeds my expectaions.
customer_reviews.author: Ronster

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset is wonderful to cook in and so easy to take care ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, as it was on her Christmas list, and although she hasn't opened it yet, I know that she will be thrilled. Le Creuset is wonderful to cook in and so easy to take care of.
customer_reviews.author: K. McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Great Pot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pot. it stays on top of the stove and I use it almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Harriman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pot!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot, it's worth what they're asking for it. I use it for any dish I make and it always comes out better than you think it will. Buy this pot (but not in green... my one mistake).
customer_reviews.author: LBD

customer_reviews.title: Great pot!
customer_reviews.text: I had to think long and hard befor I spent this much on a pot but I'm glad I did. In my research I've saved about $34.00. It came on time, and packed really well. It's all I expected although I haven't used it yet I'm sure I'll use it a lot mostly for soups and stews. I'm just hoping I don't have to replace the knob too soon but this is the best place to get one for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Deorah H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really fun to create great cuisine with this dutch oven. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love watching food network and noticed all the cooks were using the Le Creuset dutch oven's for their recipes. I saved my $, and finally purchased this oven two weeks ago. I have made everything from roast to carmel rolls in my oven, everything turned out beautifully! This is truly one of the best purchaes I have made in a long time and I know I will continue to love it for years to come. The color is beautiful and it looks so nice on my kitchen counter when it is not in use!!
customer_reviews.author: nnpony

product_meta.title: Le Creuset Signature Enameled Cast-Iron Round French (Dutch) Oven, 7-1/4-Quart, Caribbean
product_meta.description: Color:CaribbeanDesigned specifically to enhance the slow-cooking process by evenly distributing heat and locking in the optimal amount of moisture, the Signature Collection round French Oven blends the best of the past with the latest innovations for comfort and functionality. Handcrafted one at a time inside our Fresnoy-Le-Grand foundry for nearly a century, Le Creuset round French Ovens have been a fixture in homes and restaurants around the world for generations. Their enduring quality, wide-ranging versatility and stylish colors have made them indispensable in the kitchen and cherished around the table.Heat and Moisture Locking Recessed-Edge Lid
feature_bullets: 45% larger handles that provide a sure grip, even with oven mitts
The superior heat distribution and retention of le creuset enameled cast iron
An advanced sand-colored interior enamel with even more resistance to wear
A larger composite knob that withstands temperatures up to 500ºF
Colorful, long-lasting exterior enamel that resists chipping and cracking
